Package com.welie.blessed

Class BluetoothPeripheralCallback

java.lang.Object
com.welie.blessed.BluetoothPeripheralCallback
public abstract class BluetoothPeripheralCallback
extends java.lang.Object
Callbacks for BluetoothPeripheral operations

      public BluetoothPeripheralCallback()

  • Method Details

    • onServicesDiscovered

      public void onServicesDiscovered​(@NotNull @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral)
      Callback invoked when the list of remote services, characteristics and descriptors for the remote device have been updated, ie new services have been discovered.
      Parameters:
      peripheral - the peripheral

    • onNotificationStateUpdate

      public void onNotificationStateUpdate​(@NotNull @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral, @NotNull @NotNull BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic, int status)
      Callback invoked when the notification state of a characteristic has changed.

      Use BluetoothPeripheral.isNotifying(com.welie.blessed.BluetoothGattCharacteristic) to get the current notification state of the characteristic

      Parameters:
      peripheral - the peripheral
      characteristic - the characteristic for which the notification state changed
      status - GATT status code

    • onCharacteristicUpdate

      public void onCharacteristicUpdate​(@NotNull @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral, @NotNull @org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull byte[] value, @NotNull @NotNull BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic, int status)
      Callback invoked as the result of a characteristic read operation or notification

      The value byte array is a threadsafe copy of the byte array contained in the characteristic.

      Parameters:
      peripheral - the peripheral
      value - the new value received
      characteristic - the characteristic for which the new value was received
      status - GATT status code

    • onCharacteristicWrite

      public void onCharacteristicWrite​(@NotNull @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral, @NotNull @org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull byte[] value, @NotNull @NotNull BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic, int status)
      Callback indicating the result of a characteristic write operation.

      The value byte array is a threadsafe copy of the byte array contained in the characteristic.

      Parameters:
      peripheral - the peripheral
      value - the value to be written
      characteristic - the characteristic written to
      status - GATT status code

    • onDescriptorRead

      public void onDescriptorRead​(@NotNull @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral, @NotNull @org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull byte[] value, @NotNull @NotNull BluetoothGattDescriptor descriptor, int status)
      Callback invoked as the result of a descriptor read operation
      Parameters:
      peripheral - the peripheral
      value - the read value
      descriptor - the descriptor that was read
      status - GATT status code

    • onDescriptorWrite

      public void onDescriptorWrite​(@NotNull @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral, @NotNull @org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull byte[] value, @NotNull @NotNull BluetoothGattDescriptor descriptor, int status)
      Callback invoked as the result of a descriptor write operation. This callback is not called for the Client Characteristic Configuration descriptor. Instead the onNotificationStateUpdate(BluetoothPeripheral, BluetoothGattCharacteristic, int) will be called
      Parameters:
      peripheral - the peripheral
      value - the value that to be written
      descriptor - the descriptor written to
      status - the GATT status code

    • onBondingStarted

      public void onBondingStarted​(@NotNull @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral)
      Callback invoked when a bonding process is started
      Parameters:
      peripheral - the peripheral

      public void onBondingSucceeded​(@NotNull @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral)
      Callback invoked when a bonding process has succeeded
      Parameters:
      peripheral - the peripheral

    • onBondingFailed

      public void onBondingFailed​(@NotNull @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral)
      Callback invoked when a bonding process has failed
      Parameters:
      peripheral - the peripheral

    • onBondLost

      public void onBondLost​(@NotNull @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral)
      Callback invoked when a bond has been lost and the peripheral is not bonded anymore.
      Parameters:
      peripheral - the peripheral

    • onReadRemoteRssi

      public void onReadRemoteRssi​(@NotNull @NotNull BluetoothPeripheral peripheral, int rssi, int status)
      Callback invoked as the result of a read RSSI operation
      Parameters:
      peripheral - the peripheral
      rssi - the RSSI value
      status - GATT status code
